Title: Enacts the "New York state family tuition investment program act" to provide for the advance purchase of tuition to colleges in the state
Summary: Enacts the "New York state family tuition investment program act" to provide for the advance purchase of tuition to colleges in the state.
LawCode: Add Art 14-B §§696 - 696-k, Ed L; add §78-c, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law and the state finance law, in relation to establishing the New York state family tuition investment program
